story_results.user_story: As a user, I want to login so that I can access my account

parsed_story.action: login so that I can access my account
parsed_story.benefit: login so that I can access my account

generated_tests.name: Positive: Valid Credentials
generated_tests.description: Verify that login works correctly when valid credentials
generated_tests.expected_result: Login succeeds with valid credentials

generated_tests.name: Positive: Remember Me Enabled
generated_tests.description: Verify that login works correctly when remember me enabled
generated_tests.expected_result: Login succeeds with remember me enabled

generated_tests.name: Negative: Invalid Username
generated_tests.description: Verify proper error handling when invalid username
generated_tests.expected_result: Appropriate error message displayed for invalid username

generated_tests.name: Negative: Wrong Password
generated_tests.description: Verify proper error handling when wrong password
generated_tests.expected_result: Appropriate error message displayed for wrong password

generated_tests.name: UI: Login Page Layout
generated_tests.description: Verify UI elements are properly displayed for login
test_steps: Verify all UI elements are visible
Check responsive design on different screen sizes
generated_tests.expected_result: UI meets design requirements for login

generated_tests.name: UI: Login Accessibility
generated_tests.description: Verify login functionality meets accessibility standards
test_steps: Access login page using keyboard navigation
Verify all form elements have proper labels
generated_tests.expected_result: UI meets design requirements for login

generated_tests.name: API: Login Endpoint Response
generated_tests.description: Test login API endpoint returns correct response
generated_tests.expected_result: API responds correctly for login operations

generated_tests.name: API: Login Error Handling
generated_tests.description: Test login API handles invalid requests properly
generated_tests.expected_result: API responds correctly for login operations

generated_tests.name: Integration: Login with External Systems
generated_tests.description: Test login functionality integrates properly with external services
preconditions: All systems are up and running
generated_tests.expected_result: Login works seamlessly across all integrated systems

generated_tests.name: Security: Login Authorization
generated_tests.description: Verify proper authorization for login operations
generated_tests.expected_result: Login maintains security standards

generated_tests.name: Security: Login Input Validation
generated_tests.description: Test login input validation prevents security issues
test_steps: Provide malicious input to login function
generated_tests.expected_result: Login maintains security standards
